comments.text: Infinite loops of "console.log" and friends from content hang the browser, requiring a force quit, without the slow script dialog.
comments.author: pwalton@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text: Infinite loops of "console.log" and friends from content hang the browser, requiring a force quit, without the slow script dialog.
comments.creator: pwalton@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text: Nominating for blocking; this allows content to hang everything.
comments.creator: pwalton@mozilla.com
comments.text: Nominating for blocking; this allows content to hang everything.
comments.author: pwalton@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text: You can do the same in content with all kinds of other Javascript. Not sure if this is a blocker.
comments.creator: bugzilla@nulltxt.se
comments.author: bugzilla@nulltxt.se
comments.text: You can do the same in content with all kinds of other Javascript. Not sure if this is a blocker.

comments.raw_text: It's interesting that there's no slow script dialog. Not sure if that's a blocker though.
comments.text: It's interesting that there's no slow script dialog. Not sure if that's a blocker though.
comments.author: hzbz@pm.me
comments.creator: hzbz@pm.me

comments.raw_text:
so, an example test case might be:

while(1)
  console.log("foo"); ?


Wonder if we should be asking the JS team about why we're not getting slow-scripted.

I'll stop wondering and CC andreas!

gal@uci.edu
comments.text: My first guess would be we run chrome JS code (console) which resets the timer.
comments.author: gal@uci.edu
comments.raw_text: My first guess would be we run chrome JS code (console) which resets the timer.
The timeout handling is in dom, so I would say we triage this over there.
comments.author: gal@uci.edu
comments.text: The timeout handling is in dom, so I would say we triage this over there.
comments.creator: gal@uci.edu

comments.author: jstenback+bmo@gmail.com
comments.text: Yeah, this is because we switch from chrome to content, that's a known problem (so this may well be a dupe). Not going to block on this tho.
comments.creator: jstenback+bmo@gmail.com
